categories: Category:Admirals and generals of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Kalmic was a male Human admiral of the reconstituted Sith Empire stationed on Corellia in 3640 BBY, when he was killed.

Kalmic appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a Champion boss on Corellia. He is not directly involved in any quests, but can be killed for loot and as part of the achievement. This article assumes 100% game completion, which means he was killed.
